context: Do you know who stars in 10 Things I Hate About You?
Yes I do. Larry Miller and Heath Ledger star in 10 Things I Hate About You.
What other movies did Heath Ledger star in?
He also starred in the Patriot. It is a very good film.
What kind of film is the Patriot?
resp: The Patriot is a drama and action film.
